title: Distinguished Speakers
description: Learn from world-renowned experts who are shaping the future of information technologies and systems

speakers.name: Maria Da Graça RUANO
speakers.title: Electronic Engineering and Informatics
speakers.bio: Maria da Graça Ruano (female) received her Ph.D. in Electronic Engineering from the University of Wales, United Kingdom in 1992.

speakers.name: Mohamed HIMDI
speakers.title: Professeur of university, IETR
speakers.bio: MOHAMED HIMDI received the Ph.D. degree in signal processing and telecommunications from the University of Rennes 1, France in 1990

speakers.name: Antonio RUANO
speakers.title: Edge Computing and IoT: Building the Connected Future
speakers.company: Associate Professor with Habilitation, University of Algarve, Portugal.
speakers.bio: Graduate in Electrical Engineering,1982. Master of Science in Electrotech. Doctor of Philosophy in Electronic Engineering, University Wales, Bangor, 1993.

speakers.name: Ahmed LAKHSSASSI
speakers.title: Responsible of the LIMA laboratory CANADA
speakers.bio: Received the Ph.D. in Energy and Material sciences in 1995 from INRS-Energie et Materiaux Montréal, Québec, Canada.
